product in engineering each of these has a seat at the table in participating in

we had a really strong mandate that it needed to be open source first cloud capable in AWS hosted first and by first

Canon so at that point if it was coming down to a decision of rolling our own

goal was to solve for 80% of the implementation challenges that teams would face to successfully on use
elastic search and to stay out of the way for the 10% of the problems that were unique to that domain I know that

to provide for versioning and re-indexing without the applications being aware and that we can provide best

parts a query intent layer and our business rules layer so through our
query intent we not only do we need to account for the differences in consumer vocabulary and Nikes vocabulary but we

for but even once you understand the intent which is essential to recalling

agendas so for that we have our business rules layer which allows for filtering

thing to right especially in a mobile age where screen real estate is so limited it's

an example of our our whole search enhancement layer I want to walk you through a hypothetical consumer query
coming from a consumer experience of guys bread which is BR eak D that
request would come to the feeds service which is responsible for gathering and serving content and product data it

or black basketball shoes so I want to
point out as a part of this all of our synonym misspelling and phrases are actually managed outside of the index

index you'll see it there in the bottom of the diagram that has Nike taxonomy data product names phrases and all any

testability impact analysis and feasibility in our synonym and phrase
management and it takes me ramela milliseconds to get updates live into production
so in other words we don't like in the old days transform or stuff consumer
query information into our product day of data to make it more searchable rather we intercept the consumer query
and translate it to fit Nike data so now
that we have a more a better understanding of this query and we've normalized it the search enrichment

response so the search enrichment
service then returns to the consumer feeds service a rewritten elastic search
query which the service can then use to better query their own index data and retrieve not only the correct products

the decision to focus on solving search and business needs while relying on AWS
elastic search to solve many of our infrastructure and operational needs has

only a few projects of this scale at Nike did digital to deliver not only on
time but without event it was almost boring it went so smoothly and I I'm not complaining about that so to
